net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations

Annotation Type Thread


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Thread
    Methods marked with @Thread will be called from a newly created thread. For example, to specify that after the plugin's creation a specific method should be called from a dedicated thread, you would write:

    @Thread
    public void background() { ... }

    All threads are terminated upon PluginManager.shutdown().
    Author:
    Ralf Biedert
    See Also:
    Timer

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean isDaemonic
      If the thread should be daemonic.

    • Element Detail

      • isDaemonic

        public abstract boolean isDaemonic
        If the thread should be daemonic.
        Returns:
        True if the VM may exit with the thread still running..
        Default:
        true
